Uses of Class
algorithms.graph.PartitionSplit

Packages that use PartitionSplit
algorithms.graph Provides for algorithms on graphs. 
model Provides basic data structures, such as graphs, transitions, and events. 
 

Uses of PartitionSplit in algorithms.graph
 

Methods in algorithms.graph that return PartitionSplit
static PartitionSplit PartitionSplit.onlyFulfills(Partition partition)
          Create a partition split that would split all messages of partition into a separate node.
 

Methods in algorithms.graph with parameters of type PartitionSplit
 PartitionMultiSplit PartitionSplit.incorporate(PartitionSplit candidateSplit)
          Incorporates candidateSplit into this split, yielding a multi split.
 void PartitionMultiSplit.incorporate(PartitionSplit split)
          Perform the split on all partitions that would be created upon commitment of this multi split.
 

Constructors in algorithms.graph with parameters of type PartitionSplit
PartitionMultiSplit(PartitionSplit split)
          Creates a partition multi split.
 

Uses of PartitionSplit in model
 

Methods in model that return PartitionSplit
 PartitionSplit Partition.getCandidateDivision(ITransition<Partition> trans)
          Split the messages according to the presence of an outgoing transition trans (the source in trans is ignored here)
 PartitionSplit Partition.getCandidateDivisionBasedOnIncoming(Partition previous, java.lang.String relation)
          Split the partition according to an incoming transition from from labeled with relation.
